vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2150 for a bar, lounge, or tavern and an inside commercial amusement limited to a live music venue on property zoned Tract A within Planned Development District No. 269, the Deep Ellum/Near East Side District, on the northeast corner of Elm Street and North Good Latimer Expressway
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z234-180(CR)
